data.name: Interior
data.detailed_description:
Steam Video

This content is only available in an online streaming format. More information about streaming videos can be found in the Streaming Videos on Steam FAQ.


About the Video

A mysterious letter leads a young mother to seek proof of the supernatural forces haunting her daughter. A struggling filmmaker is hired to capture video footage of the strange occurrences. Over the course of the investigation, the filmmaker is plagued by disturbing phenomena that build in frequency and danger. He learns of the home’s violent past and the influence of its darkest force: Emily. The spirits turn on the filmmaker and he is taken on a terrifying postmodern journey through the unknown and beyond comprehension.
data.about_the_game: A mysterious letter leads a young mother to seek proof of the supernatural forces haunting her daughter. A struggling filmmaker is hired to capture video footage of the strange occurrences. Over the course of the investigation, the filmmaker is plagued by disturbing phenomena that build in frequency and danger. He learns of the home’s violent past and the influence of its darkest force: Emily. The spirits turn on the filmmaker and he is taken on a terrifying postmodern journey through the unknown and beyond comprehension.
data.short_description: A mysterious letter is found hidden inside a family’s new home and a struggling filmmaker is hired to capture evidence of supernatural events plaguing their young daughter. What starts out as a simple paranormal investigation leads to the filmmaker becoming isolated and alone with a dark force identified as Emily.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 or AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Network Bandwidth of 5Mbps for 540p, 3Mbps for 360p.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core I3+ or AMD equivalent recommended for HD 1080p playback
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Network Bandwidth of 12Mbps for 1080p or 8Mbps for 720p.

Minimum:

  • Processor: Intel Core 2 or AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
